Sentencas: LaGaO3 and LaGaO3 doped with various amounts of Sr and Mg were prepared using the solid-state reaction method.
Titulo: Raman studies of LaGaO3 and doped LaGaO3

Sentencas: Room temperature Raman spectra of the compounds exhibited a striking decrease in the number of bands on doping either B site only, or both A and B sites of the Perovskite structure, as compared with undoped LaGaO3.
Titulo: Raman studies of LaGaO3 and doped LaGaO3

Sentencas: This phenomenon indicates that the doping enhanced the symmetry of the crystal structure.
Titulo: Raman studies of LaGaO3 and doped LaGaO3

Sentencas: In addition, the spectra of all doped compounds showed new Raman bands at around 700 cm(-1), probably due to local symmetry decrease, caused by the oxygen vacancy induced by doping.
Titulo: Raman studies of LaGaO3 and doped LaGaO3

Sentencas: Raman spectra at elevated temperatures revealed that some LaGaO3 doped at both A and B sites became almost cubic structure at 1000 degrees C. Electrical conductivity was also measured, which is considered to be related to the long- and short-range symmetry changes observed with Raman spectra.
Titulo: Raman studies of LaGaO3 and doped LaGaO3
